meanings.definition: A person who marks a place in a book for future reference.
meanings.sent1: The librarian handed out bookmarkers to help us remember where we left off in our books.
meanings.sent2: I always use bookmarkers to keep track of the pages I want to revisit later.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended to be a magical bookmarkers fairy, sprinkling bookmarks around the library.
meanings.sent4: She was like a human bookmarkers, always there to guide us back to the right page in our story.
meanings.sent5: The bookmarkers were like tiny flags waving to remind us of the stories we enjoyed.

meanings.definition: An object used to mark a place in a book.
meanings.sent1: I found some beautiful bookmarkers with intricate designs at the bookstore.
meanings.sent2: The bookmarkers with tassels make it easy to find where you left off in your reading.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the bookmarkers were toys and batted them around the room.
meanings.sent4: The bookmarkers were like little helpers, guiding us back to our reading spot.
meanings.sent5: The bookmarkers were like colorful beacons, showing us where to continue our reading journey.

meanings.definition: The act of marking a place in a book for future reference.
meanings.sent1: Using bookmarkers is a helpful way to remember important pages in a book.
meanings.sent2: Bookmarkers make it easy to quickly find where you left off in your reading.
meanings.sent3: The bookmarkers race was on as the kids competed to see who could mark the most pages.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved like bookmarkers, swiftly marking the pages she wanted to revisit.
meanings.sent5: The bookmarkers danced across the pages, leaving a trail of memories for later.
